salaryExpectations: LKR 50,000 to LKR 400,000+ per month, highly dependent on student numbers and product sales.
futureOutlook: The private tuition market in Sri Lanka is massive, and it is rapidly moving online. Tutors who can build a strong personal brand on social media (like YouTube or TikTok) and offer high-quality, engaging content can build highly successful and scalable businesses, moving beyond one-on-one tuition to selling courses and other digital products.
